provider-configuration.name: be-belfius-cardreader
provider-configuration.passwordHelpText: Please authenticate yourself with your Belfius credentials. You will also need your Belfius card reader to finish the authentication.

fields.name: username
fields.patternError: You have to enter your full card number and control number. 17 digits.

supplementalFields.helpText:
1$ ![](https://easybanking.bnpparibasfortis.be/rsc/serv/bank/BEL/BEL_CardReader.png) Login using your Belfius Card Reader
2$ ![](https://easybanking.bnpparibasfortis.be/rsc/serv/bank/BEL/BEL_LOGIN.png) Press
3$ ![](https://easybanking.bnpparibasfortis.be/rsc/serv/bank/BEL/BEL_OK.png) Enter the security code []
supplementalFields.name: logindescription

supplementalFields.helpText:
4$ ![](https://easybanking.bnpparibasfortis.be/rsc/serv/bank/BEL/BEL_OK.png) Enter your PIN
5$ Enter the login code
supplementalFields.name: logininput

supplementalFields.helpText:
1$ ![](https://easybanking.bnpparibasfortis.be/rsc/serv/bank/BEL/BEL_CardReader.png) Sign using your Belfius Card Reader
2$ ![](https://easybanking.bnpparibasfortis.be/rsc/serv/bank/BEL/BEL_SIGN.png) Press
3$ ![](https://easybanking.bnpparibasfortis.be/rsc/serv/bank/BEL/BEL_OK.png) Enter the security code []
supplementalFields.name: signcodedescription

supplementalFields.helpText:
4$ ![](https://easybanking.bnpparibasfortis.be/rsc/serv/bank/BEL/BEL_OK.png) Want to register your device?
5$ ![](https://easybanking.bnpparibasfortis.be/rsc/serv/bank/BEL/BEL_OK.png) Enter your PIN
6$ Enter the signature code
supplementalFields.name: signcodeinput

supplementalFields.helpText:
1$ ![](https://easybanking.bnpparibasfortis.be/rsc/serv/bank/BEL/BEL_CardReader.png) Sign using your Belfius Card Reader
2$ ![](https://easybanking.bnpparibasfortis.be/rsc/serv/bank/BEL/BEL_SIGN.png) Press
3$ ![](https://easybanking.bnpparibasfortis.be/rsc/serv/bank/BEL/BEL_OK.png) Enter the security code []
supplementalFields.name: signfortransferdescription

supplementalFields.helpText:
4$ ![](https://easybanking.bnpparibasfortis.be/rsc/serv/bank/BEL/BEL_OK.png) Want to sign for the transfer?
5$ ![](https://easybanking.bnpparibasfortis.be/rsc/serv/bank/BEL/BEL_OK.png) Amount []
supplementalFields.name: signfortransferextradescription

supplementalFields.helpText:
6$ ![](https://easybanking.bnpparibasfortis.be/rsc/serv/bank/BEL/BEL_OK.png) Enter your PIN
7$ Enter the signature code
supplementalFields.name: signfortransferinput

supplementalFields.helpText: You have not transferred money to this account before. Please supply the name of the owner to the account in the field below
supplementalFields.name: addbeneficiaryinput

supplementalFields.helpText:

2$ ![](https://easybanking.bnpparibasfortis.be/rsc/serv/bank/BEL/BEL_SIGN.png) Press
3$ ![](https://easybanking.bnpparibasfortis.be/rsc/serv/bank/BEL/BEL_OK.png) Enter the security code []

supplementalFields.helpText:
4$ ![](https://easybanking.bnpparibasfortis.be/rsc/serv/bank/BEL/BEL_OK.png) Want to sign for the beneficiary?
5$ ![](https://easybanking.bnpparibasfortis.be/rsc/serv/bank/BEL/BEL_OK.png) Enter the control code []
supplementalFields.name: signforbeneficiaryextradescription

supplementalFields.helpText:

7$ Enter the signature code

provider-configuration.name: be-kbc-cardreader
provider-configuration.passwordHelpText: Please authenticate yourself with your KBC credentials. You will also need your KBC card reader to finish the authentication.

fields.name: username
fields.patternError: You have to enter your full card number and control number. 17 digits.

supplementalFields.helpText:
1$ ![](https://easybanking.bnpparibasfortis.be/rsc/serv/bank/KBC/KBC_CardReader.png) Insert your bank card into the card reader
2$ ![](https://easybanking.bnpparibasfortis.be/rsc/serv/bank/KBC/KBC_LOGIN.png) ![](https://easybanking.bnpparibasfortis.be/rsc/serv/bank/KBC/KBC_LOGIN.png) Tap
3$ Enter the start code []
supplementalFields.name: logindescription

supplementalFields.helpText:
4$ ![](https://easybanking.bnpparibasfortis.be/rsc/serv/bank/KBC/KBC_OK.png) Tap
5$ Enter your secret code
6$ ![](https://easybanking.bnpparibasfortis.be/rsc/serv/bank/KBC/KBC_OK.png) Tap
7$ Enter the login code
supplementalFields.name: logininput

supplementalFields.helpText:
1$ ![](https://easybanking.bnpparibasfortis.be/rsc/serv/bank/KBC/KBC_CardReader.png) Insert your bank card into the card reader
2$ ![](https://easybanking.bnpparibasfortis.be/rsc/serv/bank/KBC/KBC_SIGN.png) ![](https://easybanking.bnpparibasfortis.be/rsc/serv/bank/KBC/KBC_SIGN.png) Tap
3$ Enter the start code []
supplementalFields.name: signcodedescription

supplementalFields.helpText:
4$ ![](https://easybanking.bnpparibasfortis.be/rsc/serv/bank/KBC/KBC_OK.png) ![](https://easybanking.bnpparibasfortis.be/rsc/serv/bank/KBC/KBC_OK.png) Tap
5$ Enter your PIN
6$ ![](https://easybanking.bnpparibasfortis.be/rsc/serv/bank/KBC/KBC_OK.png) Tap
7$ Enter the sign code
supplementalFields.name: signcodeinput

supplementalFields.helpText:
1$ ![](https://easybanking.bnpparibasfortis.be/rsc/serv/bank/KBC/KBC_CardReader.png) Insert your bank card into the KBC card reader
2$ ![](https://easybanking.bnpparibasfortis.be/rsc/serv/bank/KBC/KBC_SIGN.png) ![](https://easybanking.bnpparibasfortis.be/rsc/serv/bank/KBC/KBC_SIGN.png) Tap
3$ Enter your start code []
supplementalFields.name: signfortransferdescription

supplementalFields.helpText:
4$ ![](https://easybanking.bnpparibasfortis.be/rsc/serv/bank/KBC/KBC_OK.png) ![](https://easybanking.bnpparibasfortis.be/rsc/serv/bank/KBC/KBC_OK.png) Tap
5$ Enter the amount, including the digits after the decimal sign
6$ ![](https://easybanking.bnpparibasfortis.be/rsc/serv/bank/KBC/KBC_OK.png) Tap to confirm
7$ Enter your PIN
8$ ![](https://easybanking.bnpparibasfortis.be/rsc/serv/bank/KBC/KBC_OK.png) Tap
9$ Enter the sign code
supplementalFields.name: signfortransferinput

provider-configuration.name: be-ing-cardreader
provider-configuration.passwordHelpText: Please authenticate yourself with your ING credentials. You will also need your ING card reader to finish the authentication. By connecting to this bank, you confirm that you have accepted the bank’s [terms and conditions]‌‌‌(https://www.ing.be/static/legacy/SiteCollectionDocuments/GeneralRegulationsNewEN.pdf).

fields.name: cardId
fields.patternError: You have to enter your full card number and control number. 17 digits.

supplementalFields.helpText:
1$ ![](https://easybanking.bnpparibasfortis.be/rsc/serv/bank/ING/ING_CardReader.png) Insert your ING bank card into the ING Card Reader
2$ ![](https://easybanking.bnpparibasfortis.be/rsc/serv/bank/ING/ING_IDENTIFY.png) Press
3$ Enter your PIN
4$ ![](https://easybanking.bnpparibasfortis.be/rsc/serv/bank/ING/ING_OK.png) Press
5$ Enter the response code
supplementalFields.name: otpinput

supplementalFields.helpText:
1$ ![](https://easybanking.bnpparibasfortis.be/rsc/serv/bank/ING/ING_CardReader.png) Insert your ING bank card in your ING Card Reader
2$ ![](https://easybanking.bnpparibasfortis.be/rsc/serv/bank/ING/ING_SIGN.png) Press
3$ ![](https://easybanking.bnpparibasfortis.be/rsc/serv/bank/ING/ING_OK.png) Enter your PIN and press
4$ Enter the following number []
supplementalFields.name: signcodedescription

supplementalFields.helpText:
5$ ![](https://easybanking.bnpparibasfortis.be/rsc/serv/bank/ING/ING_SIGN.png) And press
6$ Enter your RESPONSE code
supplementalFields.name: signcodeinput
